---
id: send-room-messages
title: "SendRoomMessage"
description: "Send room messages and push them to all online users in the room."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Messaging/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>SendRoomMessage</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Send room messages and push them to all online users in the room.

The client will receive message notifications in the room through the ZIM SDK callback interface.
<Note title="Note">After enabling the content moderation feature, messages sent by the server will be moderated by default. If messages sent by the server do not need to be moderated, please contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support for configuration.</Note>

| iOS-25% | Android-25% | macOS-25% | Windows-25% |
|-----|---------|-------|---------|
| [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_ios~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-room-message-received-info-from-room-id) | [onRoomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~java_android~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-room-message-received) | [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_macos~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-room-message-received-info-from-room-id) | [onRoomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~cpp_windows~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-room-message-received) |

| Web-25% | Mini Program-25% | Flutter-25% | React Native-25% |
|---------|---------|---------|---------|
| [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_web~interface~ZIMEventHandler#room-message-received) | [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_wxxcx~interface~ZIMEventHandler#room-message-received) | [onRoomMessageReceived](https://pub.dev/documentation/zego_zim/latest/zego_zim/ZIMEventHandler/onRoomMessageReceived.html) | [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_react-native~interface~ZIMEventHandler#room-message-received) |

| Unity3D-25% | uni-app \| uni-app x-25% | HarmonyOS-25% |
|---------|---------|---------|
| [onReceiveRoomMessage](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~cs_unity3d~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-receive-room-message) | [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_uni-app~interface~ZIMEventHandler#room-message-received) | [roomMessageReceived](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_harmony~interface~ZIMEventHandler#room-message-received) |

<Note title="Note">
The parameters FromUserId and RoomId only support numbers, English characters, and `'!'ï¼Œ'#'ï¼Œ'$'ï¼Œ'%'ï¼Œ'&'ï¼Œ'('ï¼Œ')'ï¼Œ'+'ï¼Œ'-'ï¼Œ':'ï¼Œ';'ï¼Œ'<'ï¼Œ'='ï¼Œ'.'ï¼Œ'>'ï¼Œ'?'ï¼Œ'@'ï¼Œ'['ï¼Œ']'ï¼Œ'^'ï¼Œ'_'ï¼Œ' 'ï¼Œ'{'ï¼Œ'}'ï¼Œ'|'ï¼Œ'~'`.

For sending and receiving custom messages with MessageType 200, the SDK version of the sender's and receiver's corresponding clients needs to be 2.8.0 or above.

If the receiver's SDK version is in the [2.0.0, 2.8.0) range, they can receive custom messages, but the message type will be displayed as unknown and the message content cannot be obtained. To obtain this message, please upgrade the SDK to version 2.8.0 or above.

If the receiver's SDK version is 1.x.x, they will not be able to receive custom messages, nor will they receive unknown messages.
</Note>

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 10 times/s. If you need to adjust, please contact ZEGOCLOUD sales to understand the specific billing rules.</Note>
